name: 曾釋鋒
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意
介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
schedule:
1　　Background to laser design and general applications
2　　Basic laser optics
3　　Laser safety
4　　Laser scribing technology
5　　Laser texturing technology
6　　Laser ablating technology
7　　Laser patterning technology
8　　Laser drilling technology
9　　Mid-term exam
10　　Laser milling technology 
11　　Laser annealing technology
12　　Laser cutting technology for metallic materials
13　　Laser cutting technology for glass materials
14　　Laser surface treatment technology
15　　Introduction CO2 laser beam shaping system
16　　Introduction fiber laser scanning system
17　　Final project presentation
18　　Final project presentation
scorePolicy:
1. Mid-term exam: 40% 
2. Paper review and oral report (30%)
3. Final project oral report: 30%
materials: William M. Steen, Jyotirmoy Mazumder, Laser Material Processing, 4th ed., Springer London Ltd., 2010.
